title: When will Ranked Queue's stop closing at 4am
body:
Yup so as the title says,
does anyone have any idea when these ranked queue restrictions will be lifted/discontinued.

I know they were put in place ever since the OCE server began because the amount of users on at this time wasnt enough to sustain the queue which would lead to long as hell queue times.
But considering how the server came into open beta when Kevin Rudd came back to power (June 2013) I think the amount of nighttime players would have increased - so i guess what im saying is
Any idea when these time limits will be lifted? 
aka 24/7 ranked queue availability.

replies.body:
maybe you should actually sleep sometime?

like even for people with night shifts it should be fine, they open up again at 8 iirc

Riot has all the data anyway, im sure it will go 24/7 if and when it is sustainable
